; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 03:18:17 +0000 https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/18/23966980/meta-disbanded-responsible-ai-team-artificial-intelligence乔牛肉https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38328355 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38328355 Show HN: YouTube banned adblockers so I built an extension to skip their ads

嗨，HN！

由于 Youtube 不再允许广告拦截器，我构建了自己的扩展程序来绕过他们的视频广告。如果有广告，它会暂时操纵视频；静音，将速度设置为 10 倍，如果有按钮则跳过它。

Chrome 网上应用店链接： https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/ad-accelerator/gpbo...

代码：https: //github.com/rkk3/ad-accelerator
